sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; type Props = {}; export default function CSSPractice({}: Props) { return (

Lab 2 - Cascading Style Sheets

Styling with the STYLE attribute

Inline Styles: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet consectetur adipisicing elit.

Styling with Imported CSS

Imported CSS: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet consectetur adipisicing elit.

{/* id selector */}

ID selectors

Selector 1: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet consectetur adipisicing elit.

Selector 2: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet consectetur adipisicing elit.

{/* class selector */}

Class selectors

Class selector: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet consectetur adipisicing elit.

Class selector for Heading: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet consectetur adipisicing elit.

Document structure selectors

Selectors can be combined to refer elements in particular places in the document

This paragraph's red background is referenced as
.selector-2 .selector3
meaning the descendant of some ancestor.
Whereas this span is a direct child of its parent
You can combine these relationships to create specific styles depending on the document structure

Colors

Foreground color

The text in this paragraph is red but this text is green

Background color

This background of this paragraph is red but the background of this text is green and the foreground white

Borders

Border Solid

Border Dashed

Padding

Padded top left
Padded bottom right
Padded all around

Margin all around
